parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the custom rule.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort method. Valid values:

*   desc: descending order.
*   asc: ascending order.

parameters.name: OrderField
parameters.description:
The field that is used to sort the rules. Valid values:

*   GmtModified: The rules are sorted based on the modification time.
*   Id (default): The rules are sorted based on the rule ID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. The value can be up to 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The data management center of the threat analysis feature. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the destination account to which you switch the view from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:

*   0: view of the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   1: view of all accounts for the enterprise.

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the rule. The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and periods (.).

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the rule. Valid values:

*   **predefine**
*   **customize**

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the rule. Valid values:

*   **0**: The rule is in the initial state.
*   **10**: The simulation data is tested.
*   **15**: The business data is being tested.
*   **20**: The business data test is complete.
*   **100**: The rule is in effect.

parameters.name: ThreatLevel
parameters.description:
The threat level. The value must be a JSON array. Valid values:

*   **serious**: high-risk.
*   **suspicious**: medium-risk.
*   **remind**: low-risk.
